dict.string: This app analyzes location permissions of installed apps to assess privacy risks. Your location is not tracked or stored.
This app analyzes camera permissions of installed apps to assess privacy risks. Your camera is not accessed directly.
This app analyzes microphone permissions of installed apps to assess privacy risks. Your microphone is not accessed directly.
This app analyzes contact permissions of installed apps to assess privacy risks. Your contacts are not accessed or stored.
This app analyzes calendar permissions of installed apps to assess privacy risks. Your calendar is not accessed or stored.
This app analyzes photo library permissions of installed apps to assess privacy risks. Your photos are not accessed or stored.
This app analyzes motion sensor permissions of installed apps to assess privacy risks. Your motion data is not tracked or stored.
